pages.text: $(item)Tongs$() will allow you to safely handle $(item)Blooms$().$(p)$(info) To pick up a $(item)Bloom$(), $(use) the $(item)Bloom$() with $(item)Tongs$().$(p)$(info) $(item)Tongs$() held in either hand will pick up a $(item)Bloom$() when it enters your inventory.$(p)$(info) $(item)Tongs$() can be used with the $(item)Bloomery$() and $(item)Wither Forge$().
